biography.text: I am someone who always tries new things, my education background is Information and Technology. I am very happy to learn technology related to the development of mobile and web applications. now I'm exploring how to build a mobile application using Kotlin. Usually in building a mobile application I use java, and for website development, I use laravel and vuejs. in my spare time, sometimes I learn about firebase, socketIo, pusher and many more. although sometimes just to just know it
